data.message: let me know if you found some one, would be perfect if located @ Alexandria
I'm a beginner, I can make a few apps right now, but I'm based in Cairo.

Well, location isn't a big deal, i have am app that needs to be developed and i think it only needs basic skills like tables, and charts, menu, read RSS ... nothing more ... actually i can do it as an html5 mobile page but i prefer to be a dedicated app.

please add me if you are interested...
RSS/XML parsing isn't a trivial task, and sadly, I have no experience with either, sorry.

i think if you have successfully built your hello world app this would be easy to find a code snippet that parse RSS/XML. will any way i will give you some hints about the app later and you can check if you will be able to handle it or not :)
I'm working on a twitter app right now, so I'm not an absolute beginner, I've already looked for a way to parse RSS, and all I found was people who were looking for decent libraries to do just that.
but I don't mind listening to what you have to say anyway.
